channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mayor-elect Mamdani encourages New Yorkers to stand up to ICE, know their rights
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is encouraging immigrants to "stand up to ICE" in a video released amid recent U.S. Immigration and Customs E...

item.title: Conservatives outpace liberals in marrying and having children
item.description: Conservative couples vastly outpace their liberal counterparts in getting hitched and having children, according to the Institute for Family Studies.

item.title: Ben Rhodes Keeps Getting It Wildly Wrong on Israel and Gaza
item.description: Setting the record straight on the recent New York Times screed by Obama’s deputy national security adviser.

item.title: DOJ Lawsuits Against Gun Control Policies Especially Protect The Weak
item.description: Gun control laws disproportionately harm minorities, women, and the poor — the people who benefit most from being able to protect themselves.

item.title: American Taxpayers Are Paying Somalis Millions To Not Assimilate
item.description: A review of recent federal grants reveals that taxpayers are on the hook for more than $32 million in funding for programs for Somalis in Minnesota.

item.title: Trump to sign order blocking states from regulating artificial intelligence
item.description: President Trump said on Monday that he will sign an executive order this week to block states from regulating artificial intelligence and establish fe...

item.title: Rein In the Presidential Pardon Power
item.description: A bipartisan pattern of executive abuse shows why the unilateral power to pardon should be reconsidered.

item.title: Report: Hegseth Gave Order to Kill Boat Operators Because They Were on a Target List
item.description: Is the Trump administration claiming the power to do what previous administrations have done: compile lists of ‘enemy combatants’ and kill them?

item.title: The Ops Against Pete Hegseth Are Designed To Further A Color Revolution
item.description: The attacks on Pete Hegseth are not just the usual insanity, but a progression of the left's color revolution.

item.title: Report: Obamacare Exchange Kept 9 Out Of 10 Fake Enrollees On Subsidized Coverage
item.description: A new Government Accountability Office report provides yet more reasons for Congress not to extend the enhanced Obamacare subsidies that expire at the...

item.title: Why State Courts Should Not Set National Energy Policy
item.description: Judges are improperly turning courts into bastions of climate activism.

item.title: Another Year, Another Failed Advent Calendar, And Proof That Waiting Is Hard
item.description: The only path to peace is to trust God, who is strong enough to carry the weight of all the world on his reliable shoulders.

item.title: Pope Leo Reveals His Secret
item.description: What a 17th-century monk can still teach us.

item.title: Ex-Rep. Colin Allred, Texas Democrat, drops Senate campaign to run for House seat
item.description: Former Rep. Colin Allred is scrapping his Senate campaign to seek a House seat from Texas.

item.title: Republicans, Democrats square off over U.S. attacks on suspected drug boats in the Caribbean
